QuestData.Title: The Eastern Pylon
QuestData.Description: High up in the cliffs above me there is a large crystal pylon. Who placed it there, I cannot say, nor can I determine any reason that it would be built in such a strange place.$b$bMaybe you can make more of it than I can. I personally don't care what it does, so you needn't report back to me, but perhaps one of the scholars in Marshal's Stand might be interested in what you discover.
QuestData.AreaDescription: Discover and examine the Eastern Crystal Pylon
QuestData.LogDescription: Touch the Eastern Crystal Pylon in Un'Goro Crater.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to J.D. Collie at Marshal's Stand.
QuestData.RewardText: You were right to bring this pylon to my attention, $n. This is just the sort of thing I've been studying.
